org.sql: SELECT derived_start_date, derived_due_date FROM (SELECT LEAST(MIN(descendants_work_packages.start_date), MIN(descendants_work_packages.due_date)) AS derived_start_date, GREATEST(MAX(descendants_work_packages.start_date), MAX(descendants_work_packages.due_date)) AS derived_due_date FROM work_packages LEFT OUTER JOIN relations ON relations.hierarchy <> "$1" AND relations.relates = "$2" AND relations.duplicates = "$3" AND relations.follows = "$4" AND relations.blocks = "$5" AND relations.includes = "$6" AND relations.requires = "$7" AND relations.from_id = work_packages.id LEFT OUTER JOIN work_packages AS descendants_work_packages ON descendants_work_packages.id = relations.to_id WHERE work_packages.id = "$8" GROUP BY work_packages.id) AS subquery

rewrites.sql: SELECT derived_start_date, derived_due_date FROM (SELECT LEAST(MIN(descendants_work_packages.start_date), MIN(descendants_work_packages.due_date)) AS derived_start_date, GREATEST(MAX(descendants_work_packages.start_date), MAX(descendants_work_packages.due_date)) AS derived_due_date FROM work_packages LEFT OUTER JOIN relations ON relations.hierarchy <> "$1" AND relations.relates = "$2" AND relations.duplicates = "$3" AND relations.follows = "$4" AND relations.blocks = "$5" AND relations.includes = "$6" AND relations.requires = "$7" AND relations.from_id = work_packages.id LEFT OUTER JOIN work_packages AS descendants_work_packages ON descendants_work_packages.id = relations.to_id WHERE work_packages.id = "$8" GROUP BY work_packages.id) AS subquery LIMIT 1
